stories.author: Chef Maria
stories.title: My Perfect Matcha Creation
stories.content: Created the ultimate matcha bubble tea using premium ceremonial grade matcha powder with vanilla. Smooth, creamy, and perfectly balanced.
stories.recipe: Premium Matcha + Vanilla Syrup + Tapioca Pearls + 30% Sweetness
backContent: My journey began with curiosity about Japanese tea culture and months of research into different matcha grades.
The breakthrough came when I discovered ceremonial grade matcha's natural sweetness pairs beautifully with vanilla.

stories.author: Gamer Alex
stories.title: The Most Unusual Combination
stories.content: Mixed passion fruit with oolong tea and coconut jelly. Everyone thought I was crazy, but it became the most refreshing drink ever created.
stories.recipe: Oolong Tea + Passion Fruit + Coconut Jelly + 50% Sweetness
backContent: I believe the best discoveries come from breaking conventional rules. Friends looked at me like I had three heads!
Inspiration came from a tropical vacation where I experienced perfect harmony of tea and fruit flavors.

stories.author: Artist Sarah
stories.title: Creating Art with Bubble Tea
stories.content: Created a rainbow layered drink using different colored syrups and toppings. The visual aspect of bubble tea is just as important as the taste!
stories.recipe: Layered: Strawberry + Mango + Blue Raspberry + Popping Boba
backContent: As an artist, I see bubble tea as a canvas. Each layer represents different emotions - strawberry for passion, mango for joy.
The technique requires patience and precision. I pour each layer slowly, allowing it to settle before adding the next.

stories.author: Business Owner David
stories.title: From Game to Reality
stories.content: This game inspired me to open my own bubble tea shop! Learned about flavor combinations and now serving my creations to happy customers.
stories.recipe: Black Tea + Brown Sugar + Tapioca Pearls + 70% Sweetness
backContent: Playing this game was the catalyst that changed my life. I spent countless hours experimenting with different combinations.
The game's realistic mechanics taught me about proper tea brewing and quality ingredients. Now my shop is thriving.

stories.author: Student Emma
stories.title: Study Break Discoveries
stories.content: Found the perfect bubble tea combination for late-night study sessions. Green tea with honey and mint keeps me energized and focused.
stories.recipe: Green Tea + Honey + Mint Syrup + Tapioca Pearls + 40% Sweetness
backContent: As a medical student, I needed healthy ways to stay alert. Traditional energy drinks were too harsh, coffee made me jittery.
This combination provides perfect balance of caffeine, natural sweetness, and refreshing mint kick.

stories.author: Traveler Mike
stories.title: Global Bubble Tea Adventures
stories.content: Traveled to over 20 countries and tried bubble tea everywhere. Each culture has its own unique twist on this beloved drink.
stories.recipe: Traditional Black Tea + Brown Sugar Syrup + Fresh Tapioca + 60% Sweetness
stories.backTitle: Around the World in Bubble Tea
backContent: My journey began in Taiwan, the birthplace of bubble tea. I learned from local tea masters about traditional preparation methods.
In Japan, I discovered matcha bubble tea, while in Thailand I learned about coconut-based variations.
